page.title: 06MIGRATION IN WANSFORD AREA
page.content: From our questionnaire we found that 26% had lived in the Wansford area for less than five years, 18% for between five and ten years, 8% for between ten and twenty years and 36% for more than twenty years. The main reason why the people in the Wansford area moved there is because they prefer the pleasant and quiet life of the village, a major advantage of living in the country. They said they prefered to live away from a lot of people. The 14% who want to leave the Wansford area wanted to leave because there are no shops and hardly any public transport services. They liked the Wansford area because although it seemed expensive it was quite close to Peterborough and Stamford which provide the facilities and services they need.
